title: Effective Educational Video Production Strategies

context.additional_context: Video production technique training for novice learners in science disciplines.

learning_goals: Learners can produce videos that visually explain core concepts by applying dynamic drawing principles.
Learners can design videos that enhance learner concentration by utilizing gaze-guiding techniques.
Learners can integrate content summarization and explanation-inducing strategies into video content based on generative activity principles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
